page.title: 03CHILDREN'S LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: On returning home from school 72% of the children eat a snack. A later evening meal is eaten by 96%, 66% of these having a cooked dinner. School play time activties include variations of chasing & catching; hide & seek; football & skipping. There is also an adventure playground & a see- saw. At Junior Level all children visit Kingsbury School Swimming Baths once a week. Leisure pursuits include pet-care, music practice, Brownies, Guides, Cubs , Scouts, swimming, horse riding, cycling & other sports. Indoor pursuits include stamp collecting, model making, needlework, reading, computers and television. Bed-time ranges from between 7 & 10 Before sleeping 24% watch T.V., 12% listen to the radio & 64% read.
